title: Attitude Analysis and Instructional Design for Pre-Service Physics Teachers Using ChatGPT

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational physics knowledge and understanding of instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Participants use personal devices (BYOD) to engage in online activities and offline workshops simultaneously. They practice quantitatively evaluating attitudes toward AI tool usage by applying PLS-SEM analysis methods.

learning_goals: They can derive at least three indicators to evaluate the efficiency of solving physics problems using ChatGPT.
They can analyze pre-service teachers' attitudes toward AI tools using structural equation modeling (PLS-SEM).
They can identify and discuss at least two ethical issues arising when integrating AI-based conversational tools into physics classes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
